name: Mega Store: Cute Idle Game
description:
It’s time to get into Shopping Business! Start with a mini store (where you do pretty much everything by yourself), and turn it into a Mega Store! Invest your first hard-earned money into better products, improve your store, hire workers and the most important, keep your customers happy!
Make strategic decisions, like arranging your store to keep customers flow smooth. Avoid long waits and keep your store clean! Decorating your store will improve customers mood too! =)
Discover new mechanics while advancing in the story! Meet and interact with different characters, and use their help to make the best store in the town!

FEATURES
 
• Unfold a Story full of secrets!
• Casual and Relaxing One-Handed Gameplay
• Play with Friends! Attack their stores!
• Various Stores like Clothing, Grocery, Electronics, Jewelry
• Create your own avatars, own Pets!
• Amazing high-res visuals with funny physics!

Also includes

• Enjoy Cute iMessage Stickers!
• Special Character Customization for Peoples with disabilities.
• Available in 11 languages (English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Indonesian, Thai, and Turkish).

Please note! Mega Store is Free To Play, though some in-game items can be purchased for real money!
